module.short: listens on separate sockets for TLS connections (https) using OpenSSL

entry.name: listen
entry.short: (mandatory) the socket address to listen on (same as "listen":plugin_core.html#plugin_core__setup_listen), can be specified more than once to setup multiple sockets with the same options

entry.name: pemfile
entry.short: (mandatory) file containing the private key, certificate and (optionally) intermediate certificates (the root certificate is usually not included)

entry.name: dh-params
entry.short: filename with generated dh-params (default: fixed 4096-bit parameters)

entry.name: options
entry.short: list of OpenSSL options (default: NO_SSLv2, CIPHER_SERVER_PREFERENCE, NO_COMPRESSION)

entry.name: verify-any
entry.short: allow all CAs and self-signed certificates, for manual checking (default: false)

entry.name: client-ca-file
entry.short: file containing client CA certificates (to verify client certificates)

description.textile:
For @ciphers@ see OpenSSL "ciphers":http://www.openssl.org/docs/apps/ciphers.html string
For @options@ see "options":https://www.openssl.org/docs/ssl/SSL_CTX_set_options.html. Explicitly specify the reverse flag by toggling the "NO_" prefix to override defaults.

example.title: Simple TLS on IPv4 and IPv6
TLS with any client certificate

description.textile: Supported subsets: * "client" - set @SSL_CLIENT_S_DN_@ short-named entries * "client-cert" - set @SSL_CLIENT_CERT@ to client certificate PEM * "server" - set @SSL_SERVER_S_DN_@ short-named entries * "server-cert" - set @SSL_SERVER_CERT@ to server certificate PEM
